backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, associated files, components, and metadata for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to brief descriptions of their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles plus light/dark OKLCH design tokens and global typography/background settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter fonts, meta tags, manifest, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start behavior, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main dashboard component wiring search, filters, CRUD, pagination, and layout elements within providers.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Badg: Multi-select UI with badge chips, popover list, and checkbox-driven selection.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Copy: Copy-to-clipboard button with success/error toast feedback and temporary copied state icon.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Cred: Filter bar with category, range, and branch selectors plus individual and global clear actions.
Modal form for adding or editing a credential with fields, validation, and password visibility toggle.
Search input component for filtering credentials by text query.
Displays a table of credentials with badges, copy actions, password visibility, and edit/delete controls.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Dele: Confirmation dialog for deleting a credential.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Empt: Empty-state UI prompting users to add their first credential.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Pagi: Pagination UI for navigating pages and selecting page size.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Pass: Table cell component that toggles password visibility.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/PageTi: Header block showing the system title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/FixedFoot: Fixed footer displaying a confidentiality notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/StickyHea: Sticky header with organization title, logo, and theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button to switch between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/print/PrintButto: Button that triggers browser printing for credential data.
frontend/src/constants/credentialOptions: Provides constant lists for category, range, and branch selection options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook for creating and managing a backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentialFilterin: Hook for searching and filtering credentials by query and category/range/branch filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentials.ts: Hook managing credential CRUD operations with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, managing identity state, login flow, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagination.ts: Implements a pagination hook that tracks page, page size, and returns paginated subsets of data.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and toggling via DOM class changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode values, print styles, table styling, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Loads and saves credential records to localStorage with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/types/credentials.ts: Defines the Credential interface and form data type omitting auto-generated fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, plugins, and extended utilities for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the appâ€™s current state.
